thag4.6:1.1_0: It was so welcome for me
thag4.6:2.1_0: He was glorious, the teacher of a community,
thag4.6:2.2_0: a leader who had realized the highest.
thag4.6:2.3_0: But in all the world with its gods,
thag4.6:2.4_0: he was the victor of unequaled vision.
thag4.6:3.1_0: A great giant, a great hero,
thag4.6:3.2_0: a great light free of defilement.
thag4.6:3.3_0: With the utter ending of all defilements,
thag4.6:3.4_0: the teacher fears nothing from any quarter.
thag4.6:4.1_0: For a long time, sadly, I was corrupted,
thag4.6:4.2_0: fettered by the bond of wrong view.
